synopsis: In 480 B.C., Spartan King Leonidas leads his small band of 300 soldiers against an army of more than 1 million during the Battle of Thermopylae.

title: Frances Ha
synopsis: Determined to make it as a modern dancer in New York, a young woman pursues her unlikely goal with more enthusiasm than natural talent.

title: Collateral
synopsis: Cab driver Max picks up a man who offers him $600 to drive him around. But the promise of easy money sours when Max realizes his fare is an assassin.

title: Rurouni Kenshin
synopsis: In 1868, after the Bakumatsu war ends, the ex-assassin Kenshin Himura traverses Japan with an inverted sword, to defend the needy without killing.

title: House of Flying Daggers
synopsis: Jin and Leo tangle with Mei, a dancer suspected of having ties to the House of Flying Daggers, which steals from the rich and gives to the poor.

title: Still Alice
synopsis: When a happily married linguistics professor with three children is diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease, it challenges her career and her family life.

title: Selma
synopsis: In the face of violent racist attacks, Martin Luther King Jr. leads a protest in Alabama that culminates in a historic march from Selma to Montgomery.

title: Hum Aapke Hain Koun
synopsis: Prem is a budding businessman being tutored by his elder brother, Rajesh. Nisha is the carefree favorite of her elder sister Pooja. Although it's love at first sight for Prem and Nisha, they decide to sacrifice their happiness for their...

title: Güeros
synopsis: After teenage Tomás shows up at the Mexico City apartment his brother Sombra shares with Santos, the three set off in search of a former rock star.

title: Tom Segura: Mostly Stories
synopsis: The bearded, bawdy and comically bitter Tom Segura gets real about body piercings, the 'Area 51' of men's bodies, and the lie he told Mike Tyson.

title: Predestination
synopsis: A member of an elite group of time-traveling agents who stop crime before it happens must prevent a horrific terror attack in New York City.

title: The White Helmets
synopsis: As daily airstrikes pound civilian targets in Syria, a group of indomitable first responders risk their lives to rescue victims from the rubble.

title: U Turn
synopsis: A reporter must hunt for the truth behind a strange murder after she crosses paths with a young cop and becomes the investigation's prime suspect.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam II: Soldiers of Sorrow
synopsis: The Earth Federation warship White Base and its Gundam pilot Amuro Ray struggle to make it back through enemy territory, pursued by Zeon's warriors.

title: The Wailing
synopsis: When a mysterious disease leads to death and chaos in a mountain village, a policeman with an infected daughter consults a powerful shaman.

title: Hitler - A Career
synopsis: This documentary examines how Adolf Hitler's talent for manipulation, psychology and image-making led him from humble origins to near-world conquest.

title: 100 Metros
synopsis: A man who is diagnosed with multiple sclerosis responds by training for an Ironman triathlon, with his cranky father-in-law's help.

title: Field of Dreams
synopsis: Kevin Costner stars as an Iowa farmer who hears a mysterious voice telling him to turn his cornfield into a baseball diamond.

title: Barbra: The Music ... The Mem'ries ... The Magic!
synopsis: Iconic songstress Barbra Streisand culminates her 13-city tour in Miami with dazzling ballads, Broadway standards and stories from behind the scenes.

title: Bareilly Ki Barfi
synopsis: When she falls in love with the author of a novel she adores, bohemian Bitti enlists the help of a local printer to find her new object of affection.

title: City of Joy
synopsis: Women who've been sexually brutalized in war-torn Congo begin to heal at City of Joy, a center that helps them regain a sense of self and empowerment.

title: They’ll Love Me When I’m Dead
synopsis: Actors, crew members and others who were there discuss the tumultuous creation of Orson Welles's final, unfinished film, “The Other Side of the Wind.”

title: The American Meme
synopsis: Social media stars Paris Hilton, Josh Ostrovsky, Brittany Furlan and Kirill Bichutsky hustle to build online empires -- and face the pitfalls of fame.

title: Aggretsuko: We Wish You a Metal Christmas
synopsis: While Retsuko desperately makes plans for Christmas Eve, her new obsession with seeking validation through social media spirals out of control.

title: Upgrade
synopsis: After a violent mugging leaves him paralyzed, a man receives a computer chip implant that allows him to control his body -- and get his revenge.

title: Phantom Thread
synopsis: A fashion designer is drawn to a waitress, who becomes his model, muse and lover. With time, their relationship grows in intensity -- and strangeness.

title: Seth Meyers: Lobby Baby
synopsis: SNL alumnus and subversive master of late-night TV Seth Meyers comes out from behind the desk to share some lighthearted stories from his own life.

title: The Sky Is Pink
synopsis: After succumbing to her terminal illness, a teenager posthumously narrates her parents’ tenacious relationship in this drama based on a true story.

title: Posesif
synopsis: A student diver risks her scholastic future and relationship with her father when she dates a moody transfer student consumed by their romance.

title: Ave Maryam
synopsis: A devoted nun who cares for her elder sisters must choose between upholding her vows or pursuing her forbidden feelings for a fascinating pastor.

title: Aapla Manus
synopsis: When a man falls from his balcony, an investigator questions the victim’s family, determined to uncover a darker truth behind the alleged accident.

title: Disconnect
synopsis: A group of singletons stumbles through the wild dating scene in Nairobi as two friends wonder if their relationship is more than platonic.

title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
synopsis: What was supposed to be a peaceful protest turned into a violent clash with the police. What followed was one of the most notorious trials in history.

title: Grizzlies
synopsis: A group of disaffected students form an unlikely bond through the game of lacrosse when a new teacher introduces the sport to their remote Arctic town.

title: Pressure Cooker
synopsis: An idealistic young man works hard to engineer his own future amid pressure from his father, who dreams of his son's success in the U.S.

title: One Piece Episode of Skypiea
synopsis: A mysterious map inspires Luffy to find a way to an island among the clouds. But the Straw Hats' arrival puts them in conflict with a fearsome enemy!

title: The Ghazi Attack
synopsis: An underwater reconnaissance operation turns risky as a defiant Indian navy captain and his upstanding officer clash on how to approach the mission.

title: The Other One: The Long Strange Trip of Bob Weir
synopsis: This chronicle of Bob Weir highlights his brotherhood with Jerry Garcia and his success as a member of one of the world's most influential bands.

title: Even the Rain
synopsis: While making a film about the incursion of Christopher Columbus in the New World, a director finds the Bolivian locals protesting modern exploitation.

title: The Short Game
synopsis: They are fiercely competitive athletes, determined to become champions on one of the world's toughest golf courses. And they're still in grade school.

title: Wallace and Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
synopsis: Working as experts in pest removal, Wallace and Gromit stumble upon a voracious monster that threatens to ruin the annual veggie-growing contest.

title: Take Shelter
synopsis: A family man, determined to protect his wife and deaf daughter from impending disaster, builds an impenetrable storm shelter in his backyard.

title: Adam: His Song Continues
synopsis: After their child was abducted and murdered, John and Reve Walsh fought to raise national awareness of the problem of missing children.

title: Triumph of the Heart
synopsis: This drama tells the tale of Ricky Bell, a pro running back with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers who died of a muscle disease in the prime of his career.

title: The Ryan White Story
synopsis: After contracting HIV from a tainted blood treatment, teenaged hemophiliac Ryan White is forced to fight for his right to attend public school.

title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham
synopsis: Businessman Yash and his wife, Nandini, love their sons, but Yash disowns his adopted son, Rahul, after he marries a woman of lower social standing.

title: Trailer Park Boys: Countdown to Liquor Day
synopsis: After their latest jail stint, boozy pals Julian, Bubbles and Ricky plan to go legit but learn trailer park manager Jim aims to demolish their homes.

title: Big Eden
synopsis: Henry Hart returns to Big Eden and winds up confronting his unrequited passion for his high school best friend and his feelings about being gay.

title: Southpaw
synopsis: When tragedy strikes, former boxing star Billy 'The Great' Hope is forced to start over. But does he still have what it takes to be a champion?

title: Yuva
synopsis: An accident on a bridge ties together three young men from different social classes, sparking a course of events that will forever alter their lives.

title: Divines
synopsis: A shrewd teenager and her wisecracking best friend plan to get rich or die trying by following in the footsteps of a flashy female drug dealer.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack
synopsis: Thirteen years have passed since the events of the original Mobile Suit Gundam series, and now peace is again threatened by a new Neo Zeon army. Armed with the Nu Gundam mobile suit, Amuro Ray and the Federation forces engage in one final b...

title: Get Me Roger Stone
synopsis: Examine the rise, fall and rebirth of political operative Roger Stone, who's been an influential member of Team Trump for decades.

title: Stand by Me Doraemon
synopsis: Fourth-grader Nobita Nobi tries to improve his present life so that his loyal cat robot, Doraemon, can return to his home in the future.

title: What the Health
synopsis: Through interviews with farmers, doctors and other experts, this film highlights the health dangers of the profit-fueled, modern industrialized diet.

title: El Patron, Radiografia de un crimen
synopsis: A lawyer defends an illiterate man whose exploitation by a cruel boss while working as a butcher in Buenos Aires led to tragedy. Based on a true case.

title: Patriots Day
synopsis: A tough cop on punishment duty at the Boston Marathon helps track down those responsible for the bombing that stunned the nation.

title: Joan Didion: The Center Will Not Hold
synopsis: Literary icon Joan Didion reflects on her remarkable career and personal struggles in this intimate documentary directed by her nephew, Griffin Dunne.

title: Forgotten
synopsis: When his abducted brother returns seemingly a different man with no memory of the past 19 days, Jin-seok chases after the truth behind the kidnapping.

title: Da Kath and Kim Code
synopsis: Kath and Kel's union is tested by Michael Bublé, daughter Kim tries pole dancing, pal Sharon finds love online, and a stalker lurks amid Yuletide cheer.

title: Chillar Party
synopsis: Eight feisty boys befriend young drifter Fatka. When a mean politician threatens Fatka's way of life, the boys band together in honor of their pal.

title: The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society
synopsis: A London writer bonds with the colorful residents of Guernsey as she learns about the book club they formed during the WWII German occupation.

title: Reversing Roe
synopsis: Through interviews with abortion rights supporters and opponents, this film lifts the lid on a decades-long political campaign to overturn Roe v. Wade.

title: Kaminey
synopsis: A young man pursues his dreams of wealth by breaking the law, while his twin brother tries to better his life through hard work and honesty.

title: Soorma
synopsis: This biopic on former Indian field hockey player Sandeep Singh follows the athlete’s hard-fought comeback after an accidental gunshot left him paralyzed.

title: Shirkers
synopsis: In 1992, Sandi Tan and her friends shot a quirky film on the streets of Singapore. Then the footage disappeared, sending her on a hunt for answers.

title: Dear Ex
synopsis: A teen navigates a bitter feud between his willful mom and a free-spirited man, who's the lover and insurance beneficiary of his recently deceased dad.

title: Period. End of Sentence.
synopsis: In rural India, where the stigma of menstruation persists, women make low-cost sanitary pads on a new machine and stride toward financial independence.

title: HOMECOMING: A film by Beyoncé
synopsis: This intimate, in-depth look at Beyoncé's celebrated 2018 Coachella performance reveals the emotional road from creative concept to cultural movement.

title: The Man Who Feels No Pain
synopsis: Leveraging his ability to withstand pain, a young man trains to follow in the footsteps of his martial-arts hero in this high-action, meta comedy.

title: The Black Godfather
synopsis: This documentary follows the life of Clarence Avant, the ultimate, uncensored mentor and behind-the-scenes rainmaker in music, film, TV and politics.

title: Darkest Hour
synopsis: As the threat of Nazi invasion looms, newly appointed British Prime Minister Winston Churchill rallies a nation to fight for its very survival.

title: American Factory
synopsis: In this documentary, hopes soar when a Chinese company reopens a shuttered factory in Ohio. But a culture clash threatens to shatter an American dream.

title: Clive Davis: The Soundtrack of Our Lives
synopsis: This music-driven documentary charts Clive Davis' 50-year career as one of the world's most influential record moguls.

title: El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie
synopsis: Fugitive Jesse Pinkman attempts to outrun his past. Written and directed by 'Breaking Bad' creator Vince Gilligan, starring Aaron Paul.

title: Fire in Paradise
synopsis: In this documentary, survivors recall the catastrophic 2018 Camp Fire, which razed the town of Paradise and became California’s deadliest wildfire.

title: Ronny Chieng: Asian Comedian Destroys America!
synopsis: Ronny Chieng ('The Daily Show,' 'Crazy Rich Asians') takes center stage in this stand-up special and riffs on modern American life and more.

title: Miss Americana
synopsis: In this revealing documentary, Taylor Swift embraces her role as a songwriter and performer — and as a woman harnessing the full power of her voice.

title: 37 Seconds
synopsis: Trapped by society and familial obligations, a young manga artist goes on an unconventional journey for sexual freedom and personal liberation.

title: Taylor Tomlinson: Quarter-Life Crisis
synopsis: She's halfway through her 20s — and she's over it. Too old to party, too young to settle down, comedian Taylor Tomlinson takes aim at her life choices.

title: Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt: Kimmy vs. the Reverend
synopsis: It's an interactive Kimmy special! Kimmy's getting married, but first she has to foil the Reverend's evil plot. It's your move: What should she do next?

title: Father Soldier Son
synopsis: After a single father is severely wounded in Afghanistan, he and his sons embark on a journey of sacrifice and a search for redemption.

title: Eeb Allay Ooo!
synopsis: Hired as a monkey repeller upon moving to Delhi, a young man struggles to find his footing in his unenviable job and his place in the unforgiving world.

title: Fidaa
synopsis: When U.S.-based Varun meets Bhanu at their siblings' wedding in India, sparks fly — but will distance and misunderstandings ruin their love story?

title: Fast Five
synopsis: Brian and Mia break Dom out of prison and head to Brazil to put together a racing team -- and take on a drug dealer who wants to kill them.

title: Miss Granny
synopsis: After learning she's to be sent to a rest home, an elderly widow goes for a walk and wanders into a photo studio, where she emerges as a 20-year-old.

title: An American Crime
synopsis: This drama centers on Indiana housewife and mother Gertrude Baniszewski, who imprisons and tortures a 16-year-old girl in the basement.

title: Team Foxcatcher
synopsis: With never-before seen home video, this film recounts the paranoid downward spiral of John E. du Pont and the murder of Olympic wrestler Dave Schultz.

title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
synopsis: A CIA agent and a KGB operative put their differences aside to combat a global crime organization in this droll actioner based on the 1960s TV series.

title: The Fundamentals of Caring
synopsis: In this inspirational buddy comedy, a young shut-in and his caregiver take a road trip in search of landmarks, but end up finding hope and friendship.

title: Extremis
synopsis: Witness the wrenching emotions that accompany end-of-life decisions as doctors, patients and families in a hospital ICU face harrowing choices.

title: Sky Ladder: The Art of Cai Guo-Qiang
synopsis: Known for his spectacular pyrotechnic displays, Chinese artist Cai Guo-Qiang creates his most ambitious project yet in this breathtaking documentary.

title: Blue Jay
synopsis: Two former high school sweethearts unexpectedly reunite in their old hometown, where they rediscover their magical bond and face a shared regret.

title: Bill Burr: Walk Your Way Out
synopsis: No-nonsense comic Bill Burr takes the stage in Nashville and riffs on fast food, overpopulation, dictators and gorilla sign language.

title: The Squid and the Whale
synopsis: This insightful drama looks at the crumbling marriage between a self-centered novelist -- whose career is waning -- and his up-and-coming writer wife.

title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2
synopsis: Three bachelor buddies eagerly seek true love but are woefully unprepared for the highs, lows and baffling complexities of romantic relationships.

title: Okja
synopsis: A gentle giant and the girl who raised her are caught in the crossfire between animal activism, corporate greed and scientific ethics.

title: Shot caller
synopsis: Trying to go straight, a once-successful businessman fresh out of prison is forced to orchestrate a brazen crime or risk his family.

title: Ladies First
synopsis: Born amid poverty and limited women's rights in the village of Ratu, India, Deepika Kumari rose to become the No.1 female archer in the world at 18.

title: Us and Them
synopsis: Two strangers meet on a train and form a bond that evolves over the years. After a separation, they reconnect and reflect on their love for each other.
